name: EVA (itch) (rpahel, Bakouze, JulienAb)
description:
ZQSD - Movement

Left Click - Throw Candy

Right Click - Light

E - Interact (with door or vent)

You can't kill enemies, you have to outsmart them or just run for your life.

There is currently no ending for the game. Also, the camera may be bugged after death, so you better just start again.

Programmers : Freddy Maupou, Julien Aberton, Raphael Da Costa

2D Artist : Daniel Pires

3D Artist : Raphael Da Costa
